official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynn Harbor, Massachusetts.

summary.text: Directs the Chief of Engineers, in lieu of local interests, to dredge and maintain a suitable channel of a specified depth and distance from the inner end of the navigation project for Lynn Harbor, Massachusetts.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynn Harbor, Massachusetts.
